title: Mozart
description: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart was an extraordinary musician who began playing and writing music as a young child. His amazing talents did not provide him with an easy life. He lived in poverty for his entire life and died at the age of 36. This biography explains why he is considered the greatest musician ever to live.
